query:
UPDATE blockchain_tasks 
                SET status = CASE WHEN retry_count + 1 >= max_retries THEN 'max_retries' ELSE 'failed' END::task_status,
                    retry_count = retry_count + 1,
                    last_error = $2,
                    next_retry_at = NOW() + (POWER(5, retry_count) * INTERVAL '1 second'),
                    updated_at = NOW()
                WHERE id = $1
